an7.3:4.2: At one time the Buddha was staying near Sāvatthī, in Jeta’s Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s monastery. …
an7.3:4.5: The powers of faith, energy, conscience, prudence, mindfulness, samādhi, and wisdom.
an7.3:5.4: and wisdom as the seventh power.
an7.3:6.1: They’d examine the teaching in the right way,
an7.3:6.4: is like a lamp going out.”
